scripts.build:samples: gulp install:samples && yarn run build && gulp build:samples && gulp test:samples && gulp test:e2e:samples
scripts.publish: yarn run prerelease && yarn run build:prod && lerna publish --force-publish --exact -m "chore(@aimelo) publish %s release"
scripts.publish:beta: yarn run prerelease && yarn run build:prod && lerna publish --npm-tag=beta -m "chore(@aimelo) publish %s release"
scripts.publish:next: yarn run prerelease && yarn run build:prod && lerna publish --npm-tag=next --skip-git -m "chore(@aimelo) publish %s release"
scripts.publish:rc: yarn run prerelease && yarn run build:prod && lerna publish --npm-tag=rc -m "chore(@aimelo) publish %s release"
scripts.publish:test: yarn run prerelease && yarn run build:prod && lerna publish --force-publish --npm-tag=test --skip-git -m "chore(@aimelo) publish %s release"
